About Me

Let me Introduce Myself...

BIO

I am self-motivated person who enjoys working on solving problems using computer technologies. I also enjoys learning new stuff and trying new technologies.

Key Attributes

  • Work well independently and as a team player
  • Multi-tasker. Flexible. Adaptable
  • Highly attentive to detail. Accurate
  • Capable manager of priorities, time/line, projects
  • Ability to deal with multiple deadlines

    • QA Analyst

  • Understanding of the software development life cycle (SDLC) with the ability to deliver quality software to client standards and on schedule.
  • Creating test plan, test cases, and test closure
  • Participating in weekly meetings with high management
  • Handling multiple projects before the deadlines
  • Ingesting and Extracting the data from Big Data
  • Writing custom quires using Hive to check data validation schema validation and partitions etc.
  • Utilized Eclipse, HP ALM, Confluence, Jira, Bitbucket, Hue, Putty, PowerPoint
  • Knowledge of the relational databases with strong knowledge of SQL and object-oriented programmings like C, C++ and Java.

    • Customer Service Representative

  • Answer the phone in a timely manner and direct calls to the correct offices
  • Create and manage both digital and hardcopy filing systems for all patients
  • Deal with bookings by phone, e-mail, letter, fax or face-to-face
  • Complete procedures when Clients arrive and leave
  • Take and pass on messages to Clients
  • Deal with special requests from Doctors
  • Answer questions about what the clinic offers and the surrounding area
  • Deal with complaints or problems
  • Answer telephone calls and take messages or forward calls
  • Schedule and confirm appointments and maintain event calendars
  • Check visitors in and direct or escort them to specific destinations
  • Inform other employees of visitors' arrivals or cancellations
  • Enter customer data and send correspondence
  • Copy, file and maintain paper or electronic documents and records
  • Handle incoming and outgoing mail
